KRASS – Voucher campaign from gamed!de

1000 Minecraft servers for a month for free with a voucher from us

And again we have opened a voucher for you on the net. This time it’s about one Minecraft Server 1 month free from gamed!de to be able to use. Of course I want gamed!de* Convince yourself of your performance and win more customers.

The boys from gamed!de put in their new promotion 1000 minecraft servers free for 1 month ready to gamble. The exact conditions of participation are described in detail on your website under Minecraft.

How to get your free Minecraft server for a month!

go to gamed!de to the website*choose at the Game servers now Minecraft Now configure a game server that costs a maximum of 5 euros/month. For example 1GB memory, 1 month term, with 6 TS3 slots for 4.87 EUR! As a payment method definitely the prepaid option select, otherwise the server will be extended with costs. Then pay with the following 5 Euro voucher gamed!de provided: €5 voucher: minecraft-8af9e201e0 * Start playing on your own Minecraft server for a month on free.

Important: The promotion is only valid for new customers and only while stocks at gamed!de last!

Minecraft at gamed!de – the advantages for you

gamed!de has combined its Minecraft servers in a cloud system and developed a special resource-optimized setup for Minecraft. As you know from our know-how article, a Minecraft game server is quite demanding in terms of RAM memory. The advantage of a Minecraft cloud is, in addition to the quick provision of resources, also a optimized and fair load balancing, so that you always have reliable performance and availability can expect. The pricing model is also fair, which is billed according to memory (RAM) and you can decide how many slots make sense. Read our recommendations regarding memory and how to get Minecraft faster. Of course, you can also switch mods and versions to a game server cloud with a simple “click”.

With your admin rights you can install everything

  • Minecraft – Bukit
  • Minecraft – Feed The Beast Lite
  • Minecraft – Feed The Beast Ultimate
  • Minecraft – Feed The Beast Unleashed
  • Minecraft – Hexxit
  • Minecraft – Tekkit
  • Minecraft – Tekkit Lite
  • Minecraft Bungeecord
  • Dynamap allowed
  • remote toolkit[/wpsm_tab] [/wpsm_tabgroup]

The services of gamed!de at a glance

  • Gameserver is immediately available online
  • Mysql database and TS3 etc can be booked optionally
  • Ram is permanently assigned to the server (no sharing) so better performance for Minecraft
  • Don’t pay too much! Memory price model with free slot choice
  • Install and change the version with one click
  • Backup function in the background automatically
  • There is also a free subdomain
  • Of course you can also bring your project, i.e. your own world, and upload it
  • Bungeecord available with a click
  • 5 EUR voucher promotion!

Do you already know gamed!de?

We like to play on servers from gamed!de. You can find out why in our SPOTLIGHT article in which we present gamed!de in more detail. gamed!de is also on our list of game server providers.

But in a nutshell: gamed!de is one of the major game server providers from Germany with several locations gamed!de especially with its ESL premium game server, which are also certified by the ESL. The ESL game server certificate is awarded to game server providers whose servers meet the high standards of the ESL. These must ensure a fair gameplay in the ESL. Solid, sustained performance is a must, and a remedy against server-side cheats as well. Both EPS server are particularly powerful game servers, which are designed for the requirements of the EPS leagues of the ESL and are certified by the ESL. This performance is expressed in the constant and high FPS values ​​(1000 FPS with CS 1.6 and 1000 FPS with CS:S).

Questions and answers (FAQ) Rent a game server at gamed!de

Does a contract renew automatically?

Yes, unless you use a PREPAID SERVER. You can extend it yourself.

When is the game server available online?

All servers are available immediately after receipt of payment. So with PREPAID immediately.

Where are the servers and how are they connected?

The gamed!de servers are located in Germany unless otherwise stated. For example in the Düsseldorf data center with a direct connection to Amsterdam, Netherlands (AMS-IX), Frankfurt, Germany (DE-CIX) and Zurich, Switzerland (Swiss-IX)

Alternatively there are other locations in Russia (Moscow), Poland (Warsaw) and in Spain (Madrid)

What does free slot selection mean and do I also have FTP access?

You can freely adjust the number of players (SLOT) and FTP access is completely free.

Is there a web interface to manage the game server?

Of course there is. The server can be managed via our web interface. Here you can install all versions that we provide with a click. The configuration is also done via the web interface in the respective configuration files. Additionally there are features like bungeecord and the remote toolkit available. You can also access the console from here.

Can you use dynmap?

Dynamo can also be used at any time on the Minecraft servers
